website_summaries.verdict: Choose these Nike socks for kids with active lifestyles who like the low-profile style. Great for warm-weather wear.
pros: Comfortable no-show socks that pair nicely with sneakers and other athletic shoes
Come in plain white or color combinations in various sizes and styles for boys and girls
cons: Sizes tend to run small, and may shrink a bit when washed

customer_reviews.title: Horribe
customer_reviews.text: These are not Sri-fit socks, they’re regular thick socks. Inaccurate description.
customer_reviews.author: Bona Osmani

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler. He wears a toddler size 9 in shoes. They aren’t extremely thick but they aren’t thin either, just the right thickness to wear with his sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boys socks!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these socks and I’m buying two more packs. My son is 5 years old and constantly losing socks. These are perfect because they are cute, Nike, and all match. I’m going to finally toss all his mismatched ones at the bottom of the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! For those reviews saying they are too small etc, these are sized exactly like every other Nike kids socks. I think some people are buying them thinking they are adult sizes. Yes, they do shrink a bit when you wash them. However, if you don’t over dry them and stretch them a bit when they come out or the dryer they go back to the size they were. Overall I think they are a great buy!! Can’t beat the price or quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel but too big for women’s 5.5 shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel & no show of these socks but based on other reviews I ordered medium for shoe size 5.5 women’s. These socks are too big, wish I would’ve ordered small. I washed & dried hoping they’d shrink but they didn’t (or at least not enough). I’ll wear them anyway but I’m bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffmommy2B

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I washed these socks for the first time before having my son wear them. I washed them in cold water and dried them on low, like I do with all of my laundry. The socks shrank so much that they won’t fit my son (size 1.5 kids) and instead fit a toddler. They are also thick and not what I’d consider dri-fit. I’m very disappointed in these socks and unfortunately I can’t return them because I washed them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Not no-show
customer_reviews.text: The socks are very well made but they are NOT no-show. FYI, if you wear Vans they sock will show. Google Van socks and see what you should buy if you want no-show.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They are thick enough to wear with sneakers on a run and comfortable enough to wear with chucks for the everyday. I haven’t had any issues with slipping of my heel or stretching out.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymeeb11

customer_reviews.title: My kids favorite socks
customer_reviews.text: These are my kids favorite socks! The love that they aren’t too thick as fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH LINT!
customer_reviews.text: The amount of lint that comes off the inside of these socks is seriously crazy! Even after washing them multiple times. They also run very large IMO. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: These socks Are extremely poor quality and each one fits slightly different. The fabric is not soft and is extremely thin. I would not recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value! Great socks for the price. Super comfy and they hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My 7 year old loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great fit; nice and low for shorts and tennis shoes. My 7 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: T Family

customer_reviews.title: High quality socks
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman size 5 and it's perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ayala

customer_reviews.title: great quality socks
customer_reviews.text: not disappointed received on lightning deal so even better great quality and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct size
customer_reviews.text: The X-Small does not fit child size 10C like it stated. It's the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't Buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my Daughter and she wears them. But.....The tops of them stretch out easily. She has sorta wide feet so after they are stretched out they aren't comfortable anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Frier

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: these socks are perfect for my son he wears a size 13.5 to a 1 and the small was perfect for him i will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son perfectly and will be great for the summer months ahead
customer_reviews.author: Dana Geer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, I’ve got 3 packs for my son already. He wears a size 13/1 and these fit perfect. He loves them because they aren’t too hot to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This ain’t no show
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve read the reviews before purchasing :/ and I already opened it to try it on, it was not no-show and I can’t return it. So I can only hope it’ll shrink after washing and drying :/ don’t get it people
customer_reviews.author: Trinity C.

customer_reviews.title: It said medium but was kids y6 to small.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these they arrived and it was youth y6 not medium adults but I gave them to a friend they were to small for me colors were great iam a men's 8 to 8.5.tnx.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved how thin these socks are for my kiddos. Arrived timely and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Abts

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. Don’t waste your money. Fit is horrible. Lost their shape. Elastic outstretched. Worst socks ever.
customer_reviews.author: thomas formica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these socks for my son. He loves them! Fit perfectly at the shoe line. Liked them so much, I ordered them in black too! Would order again when his feet hit another growth spurt.
customer_reviews.author: Marmar

product_meta.title: Nike Kids' Everyday Lightweight No-Show Socks (6 Pairs)
product_meta.description: Kids' Nike Performance Lightweight No-Show Training Socks (6 Pair) feature sweat-wicking technology for moisture management and mesh fabric at the top of the foot for enhanced ventilation. Lycra spandex is 2 times as thick as previous versions, providing you with an improved fit.
feature_bullets: KIDS' SOCKS: The Nike lightweight girls and boys' socks feature sweat-wicking technology for enhanced ventilation and moisture management. The cotton fabric provides a soft, comfortable feel.
IMPROVED FIT: Spandex support is twice as thick as previous versions, providing the kids' no show socks with an improved fit. Arch band and toe seams ensure a locked-in fit with no distractions.
BREATHABLE DESIGN: Mesh fabric panel on top of the kids' socks enhance ventilation and mobility. Lycra spandex provides better stretch recovery, preserving the shape of the ankle sock overtime.
DRI-FIT TECHNOLOGY: The boys and girls' socks move sweat away from your skin to help you stay dry and comfortable even when training in the most intense conditions.
ANKLE SOCKS: Imported, machine wash, multi-color, fabric: 76% cotton/20% nylon/2% spandex/2% polyester
